7_1CHcEy3SYsQvrW9uskKTZxUWj97BmZmvfa.body: Is there anyway to accept new pages without the need to visit them? Like, assume you want to support as many as possible, have decent space, and can allot up to a certain amount of people to use that much space. Is there a way you could make it so this could be up for grabs until you run out?
